name: Lovely Runner
summary: The series follows the journey of Im Sol, an ardent fan of idol Ryu Sun-jae. Sol, a once-promising film director whose dreams were shattered by an accident leaving her paralyzed, finds solace in the music of Sun-jae.

name: Stranger Things
summary: Stranger Things is an American science fiction horror drama television series created by the Duffer Brothers for Netflix. Produced by Monkey Massacre Productions and 21 Laps Entertainment.

name: The Witcher
summary: The Witcher is a fantasy drama television series created by Lauren Schmidt Hissrich for Netflix. It is based on the book series[a] by Polish writer Andrzej Sapkowski. Set on a fictional, medieval-inspired landmass.
cast: Henry Cavill, Anya Chalotra, Freya Allan

name: Money Heist
summary: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' plans the biggest heist in recorded history.

name: The Crown
summary: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped.

name: Squid Game
summary: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games.

name: Harry Potter
summary: Harry lies, telling Quirrell that he sees himself in the mirror winning the house cup for Gryffindor. Voldemort tells Quirrell that Harry is lying..

name: Dexter
summary: He's smart, he's good looking, and he's got a great sense of humor. He's Dexter Morgan, everyone's favorite serial killer.

name: fast and fouris 2
summary: 2 Fast 2 Furious premiered at the Universal Amphitheatre in Los Angeles on June 3, 2003. The film received mostly negative reviews from critics and grossed $236.4 million worldwide
cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, and Dwayne Johnson
